mapper.sql: id, type_name, type, remark, update_by, upate_date, enable_flag
mapper.insert: insert into account_dic_type (id, type_name, type, remark, update_by, upate_date, enable_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enableFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into account_dic_type
id,
type_name,
type,
remark,
update_by,
upate_date,
enable_flag,

mapper.update:
update account_dic_type
type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upate_date = #{upateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enable_flag = #{enableFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update account_dic_type set type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upate_date = #{upateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enable_flag = #{enableFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from account_dic_type dic
and dic.type_name like '%${p.typeName}%'
and dic.type = ${p.type}
and dic.remark like '%${p.remark}%'
